documentation.text: @return true in case of PlanterFund contract have been initialized

@dev admin can set the minimum amount to withdraw
 @param _amount is withdraw treshold

@dev emitted when a planter {planterId} funded {amount} for tree
 with id {treeId}

@dev emitted when a planter by address {account} withdraw {amount}
 from balance

@dev emitted when planterFund set for tree with id {treeId} with 
planter amount {planterAmount} and referral amount {referralAmount}
@return true in case of PlanterFund contract have been initialized

@dev admin can set the minimum amount to withdraw
 @param _amount is withdraw treshold

@dev emitted when a planter {planterId} funded {amount} for tree
 with id {treeId}

@dev emitted when a planter by address {account} withdraw {amount}
 from balance

@dev emitted when planterFund set for tree with id {treeId} with 
planter amount {planterAmount} and referral amount {referralAmount}

PlanterBalanceWithdrawn(uint256,address).details: emitted when a planter by address {account} withdraw {amount} from balance

PlanterFundSet(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: emitted when planterFund set for tree with id {treeId} with  planter amount {planterAmount} and referral amount {referralAmount}

PlanterFunded(uint256,address,uint256).details: emitted when a planter {planterId} funded {amount} for tree with id {treeId}

fundPlanter(uint256,address,uint64).details: based on the {_treeStatus} planter charged in every tree update verifying

params._treeId: id of a tree to fund
params._treeStatus: status of tree NOTE emit a {PlanterFunded} event

returns._0: true in case of PlanterFund contract have been initialized

setPlanterFunds(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: set planterFunds and refferalFunds of a tree with id {_treeId} and add {_planterFund} to planterFund part of totalFunds and add {_referralFund} to referralFund part of totalFunds NOTE emit a {PlanterFundSet} event

setWithdrawThreshold(uint256).details: admin can set the minimum amount to withdraw

withdrawPlanterBalance(uint256).details: planter withdraw {_amount} from planter's balances in case of valid {_amount} and daiToken transfer to planters address (to msgSender())

params._amount: amount to withdraw NOTE emit a {PlanterBalanceWithdrawn} event
